column2: Large primary tumor on top of head, forcing eyes shut. Otherwise appeared normal in behavior, maybe slightly lethargic.
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Despite large tumor pushing down on skull, skull appeared intact and the tumor didn't seem to penetrate the skull
Small nodule on one of lungs.
Tumor chunks frozen and cell line attempted.
